channel.title: Error Connecting to Server
channel.description: Hello, whenever I try to log into my server on my own IP. It always says, "Error Connecting to Server" But when i have it set to localhost or 127.0.0.1, it works perfectly fine. IDK What im doing wrong. I have my firewall shutoff. Any Help?

item.title: Error Connecting to Server
item.dc:creator: @Trxkin Trxkin
item.description:
@Trxkin wrote:

I did add a port. It’s 43594. And Im pretty sure, i portforwarded it. How i portforward it, is by. runing server, then runing uTorrent. Doesn’t that portforward it?

Read full topic
